attributes.comment:
To whom it may concerned:

While I understand the need for higher fees to cover handling and processing
costs, I feel raising the fees for these services is unfair for one main reason. The
current wait time for many adoptions has been extended such that many families
must submit fingerprints and applications TWICE to the USCIS. So now, these
families are incurring double the costs + higher fees! It is like being double-taxed!
Until the USCIS extends the expiration dates of fingerprints and the I171-H
document, raising the fees is unfair and puts an even larger burden on families
going through an already extremely cumbersome process.

Sincerely,
Jenny Lagerquist

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Jenny M. Lagerquist
